reviewText: If you have never seen any episodes of Red Eagle (Aguila Roja), which by now is into its fifth season, you will find that it gives you a trailer-like version of the TV series.  I bought it out of curiosity.  It was definitely a "taste" of what you can expect from watching the TV series.  I was pleasantly surprised that I was able to get a copy first of all and then, at a reasonable price.  Amazon is the best!  Please note that it is Region 2, so you must have a multi-region dvd player to watch it.
